methodInvoke.name: lib.soql
methodInvoke.parameters: [select id, name from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricMaster__c where name =: metricName limit 1]

assignHeap.name: mmetricMasterList
assignHeap.rhs: [select id, name from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricMaster__c where name =: metricName limit 1]

methodInvoke.name: lib.soql
methodInvoke.parameters: [select id, name from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricMaster__c where name =: metricName]

assignHeap.name: mmetricMasterList
assignHeap.rhs: [select id, name from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricMaster__c where name =: metricName]

methodInvoke.name: lib.soql
methodInvoke.parameters: [select id, name,AIES_ACCENTURE__MetricMaster__r.name,AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricData__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__MetricMaster__r.name =: metricName and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=: Portfolio]

assignHeap.name: mmetricMasterList
assignHeap.rhs: [select id, name,AIES_ACCENTURE__MetricMaster__r.name,AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__AIESMetricData__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__MetricMaster__r.name =: metricName and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=: Portfolio]

methodInvoke.name: lib.soql
methodInvoke.parameters: [select id, name, AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c, AIES_ACCENTURE__Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__SME_Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Summary__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview_Recommendation__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c=true and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=null limit 20]

assignHeap.name: overviewRecommendationTemplate
assignHeap.rhs: [select id, name, AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c, AIES_ACCENTURE__Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__SME_Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Summary__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview_Recommendation__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c=true and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=null limit 20]

methodInvoke.name: lib.soql
methodInvoke.parameters: [select id, name, AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Recommendation__c, AIES_ACCENTURE__SME_Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Summary__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview_Recommendation__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c=false and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=:currentPortfolioId limit 20]

assignHeap.name: ExistingRecommendationsData
assignHeap.rhs: [select id, name, AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Recommendation__c, AIES_ACCENTURE__SME_Recommendation__c,AIES_ACCENTURE__Summary__c from AIES_ACCENTURE__Overview_Recommendation__c where AIES_ACCENTURE__IsTemplate__c=false and AIES_ACCENTURE__Portfolio__c=:currentPortfolioId limit 20]
